member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Program.MainInternal(System.String[],NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.CommandOutputLogger)
member.summary: Internal Main. This is used for testing.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.Program.TryParseVerbosity(System.String[],Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.CommandOption,NuGet.Common.LogLevel@)
member.summary: Attempts to parse the desired log verbosity from the arguments. Returns true if the arguments contains a valid verbosity option. If no valid verbosity option was specified, the log level is set to a default log level and false is returned.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Both operations, --list and --clear, are not supported in the same command. Please specify only one operation. usage: NuGet locals <all | http-cache | global-packages | temp> [--clear | -c | --list | -l] For more information, visit http://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/command-line-reference.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The API key for the symbol server..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies the symbol server URL. If not specified, nuget.smbsrc.net is used when pushing to nuget.org..

member.name: T:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.CommandLineUtility
member.summary: This class holds common commandline helper methods.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.CommandLineUtility.SplitAndJoinAcrossMultipleValues(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Helper method to join across multiple values of a commandline option. E.g. - Input - { "net45; netcoreapp1.1", "netstandard1.6; net46", "net451"} Output - [ "net45", "netcoreapp1.1", "netstandard1.6", "net46", "net451" ]
member.param: List of values.
member.returns: A string array of values joined from across multiple input values.

member.name: T:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.CommandOutputLogger
member.summary: Logger to print formatted command output.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.MSBuildAPIUtility.GetProject(System.String)
member.summary: Opens an MSBuild.Evaluation.Project type from a csproj file.
member.param: CSProj file which needs to be evaluated

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.MSBuildAPIUtility.GetProject(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Opens an MSBuild.Evaluation.Project type from a csproj file with the given global properties.
member.param: CSProj file which needs to be evaluated
Global properties that should be used to evaluate the project while opening.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.MSBuildAPIUtility.RemovePackageReference(System.String,NuGet.Packaging.Core.PackageDependency)
member.summary: Remove all package references to the project.
member.param: Path to the csproj file of the project.
Package Dependency of the package to be removed.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.MSBuildAPIUtility.AddPackageReference(System.String,NuGet.Packaging.Core.PackageDependency)
member.summary: Add an unconditional package reference to the project.
member.param: Path to the csproj file of the project.
Package Dependency of the package to be added.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.MSBuildAPIUtility.AddPackageReferencePerTFM(System.String,NuGet.Packaging.Core.PackageDependency,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Add conditional package reference to the project per target framework.
member.param: Path to the csproj file of the project.
Package Dependency of the package to be added.
Target Frameworks for which the package reference should be added.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.MSBuildAPIUtility.GetItemGroup(Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemGroupElement},System.String)
member.summary: Get an itemGroup that will contains a package reference tag and meets the condition.
member.param: Project from which item group has to be obtained
List of all item groups in the project
An item type tag that must be in the item group. It if PackageReference in this case.
member.returns: An ItemGroup, which could be null.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.MSBuildAPIUtility.GetPackageReferences(Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project,NuGet.Packaging.Core.PackageDependency)
member.summary: Returns all package references after evaluating the condition on the item groups. This method is used when we need package references for a specific target framework.
member.param: Project for which the package references have to be obtained. The project should have the global property set to have a specific framework
Dependency of the package.
member.returns: List of Items containing the package reference for the package.

member.name: M:NuGet.CommandLine.XPlat.MSBuildAPIUtility.GetPackageReferencesForAllFrameworks(Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project,NuGet.Packaging.Core.PackageDependency)
member.summary: Returns all package references after evaluating the condition on the item groups. This method is used when we need package references for all target frameworks.
member.param: Project for which the package references have to be obtained. The project should have the global property set to have a specific framework
Dependency of the package.
member.returns: List of Items containing the package reference for the package.

member.name: M:NuGet.Shared.EqualityUtility.OrderedEquals``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1},System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``1},System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{``0})
member.summary: Compares two enumberables for equality, ordered according to the specified key and optional comparer. Handles null values gracefully.
member.typeparam: The type of the sorting key
member.param: This list
The other list
The function to extract the key from each item in the list
An optional comparer for comparing keys
An optional comparer for sequences

member.name: M:NuGet.Shared.EqualityUtility.SequenceEqualWithNullCheck``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{``0})
member.summary: Compares two sequence for equality, allowing either sequence to be null. If one is null, both have to be null for equality.

member.name: M:NuGet.Shared.EqualityUtility.SetEqualsWithNullCheck``1(System.Collections.Generic.ISet{``0},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{``0})
member.summary: Compares two sets for equality, allowing either sequence to be null. If one is null, both have to be null for equality.

member.summary: Hash code creator, based on the original NuGet hash code combiner/ASP hash code combiner implementations

member.name: M:NuGet.Shared.Extensions.AsList``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Return the enumerable as a List of T, copying if required. Optimized for common case where it is an List of T. Avoid mutating the return value.

member.name: M:NuGet.Shared.Extensions.AsHashSet``1(System.Collections.Generic.ISet{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{``0})
member.summary: Return the ISet as a HashSet of T, copying if required. Optimized for common case where it is a HashSet of T. Avoid mutating the return value.
